link_name: Template OS Windows Discovery iSCSI Target (LLD)
link_desc:
Template to Discover and Monitor iSCSI Target on Windows Server 2012 R2.

Note: I've tested only on Zabbix 3.0.14 and Windows Server 2012 R2 only

Features:
- LLD for iSCSI Virtual Disk
- Performance Counter for iSCSI Sessions information
- Support both Passive and Active agents

Install instruction:
1) Download & Extract
2) Import following file to Zabbix server:
- zbx_export_templates_Windows_OS_Discovery_iSCSI_Target.xml
- zbx_export_templates_Windows_OS_Discovery_iSCSI_Target_Active.xml
3) Copy file get_iscsi_vdisk.ps1 into c:\scripts at target OS
4) Add below UserParameter line into zabbix_agentd.conf at target OS

UserParameter=windowsiscsivdiskperf.discovery,powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File c:\scripts\get_iscsi_vdisk.ps1

5) Restart Zabbix agent at target OS
6) Add target host into Zabbix server & link with this template
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Zabbix Agent Active
author: Nagorn S.
